name: Deactivate The Shield Generator
Text: 'Deploy on Bunker. During your control phase, if you control Bunker with a Rebel, attempt to ''blow away'' Bunker as follows: Charges! Come On, Come On!: Draw two destiny. Add 3 to total for each Explosive Charge on Bunker. Move! Move! Move!: If total destiny > 12, your characters here may relocate to Back Door for free, Bunker and Landing Platform (if on table) are ''blown away,'' opponent loses 8 Force and this card is lost.',
